guide.introduction:
I dont want to bore you so right of the bat heres the code .

void setup() {

Serial.begin(9600);

}

void loop() {

int sensorReading = analogRead(A0);

Serial.println(sensorReading);

int thisPitch = map(sensorReading, 400, 1000, 100, 1000);

tone(9, thisPitch, 10);

}
